DOC.brief_summary: This study is being done to determine if the use of EGCG-Enhanced Extra Virgin Olive Oil in a daily diet will improve endothelial function.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of EGCG-Enhanced Extra Virgin Olive Oil on Endothelial Function
DOC.detailed_description: Patients will be randomized to receive either placebo ROO (refined olive oil) or study solution EGCG-EVOO (EGCG enhanced extra-virgin olive oil) over the four month study period.
DOC.criteria: Patients will be included in the study if they have an abnormal endothelial function study. This is defined at our institution as an RHPAT index of less than 2. Patients will undergo two RHPAT analyses and included abnormal values are obtained on either one or both tests. Only patients who provide written informed consent will be included. Patients with normal baseline endothelial function studies defined as RHPAT index >2 will be excluded. Patients with uncontrolled hypertension >180/100 while on medication on initial evaluation will also be excluded.
